summary: AN ORDINANCE granting GATX Terminals Corporation, a Delaware Corporation permission to maintain and operate a petroleum pipeline system in, along, under and across 11th Avenue Southwest, north of Southwest Lander Street for a ten (10) year term, renewable for two successive ten-year terms, specifying the conditions under which the permit is granted, providing for acceptance of the permit and conditions, and superseding Ordinance 66843, as amended.
